Header.title: Our rate dey friendly
Header.paragraph: Make we be your sure plug for Cryptocurrency and Giftcards, we nor go disappoint you.

About.paragraph: Welcome to T & G Exchange, your number one source for all things cryptocurrency and giftcards. We're dedicated to giving you the very best of our services, with a focus on dependability, customer service and accountability. T & Gee Exchange has come a long way from its beginnings, from a small time business to one of the largest crypocurrency dealers in Nigeria. We buy cryptocurrency and giftcards from you at the best rates you can ever imagine, easily and conveniently. If you have any questions or comments, please don't hesitate to contact us

Testimonials.text: "After Being Scammed Once, i have been looking for a reliable vendor for exchanging my gift cards, and i finally found it ."

Testimonials.text: "I just love the customer service, and their rates are almost unbelivable."
Testimonials.name: Godknows Enyinna Nonju
